Articles.Content:
NOTE:This challenge requires BD Armory

Sir, we've detected a enemy base on Eve. It seems they thought we wouldn't find them.

Setup:

  1. Set up a Eve base complete with a plane hanger (we will get back to it later) and stationary anti-aircraft guns. (Hyperedit is allowed)
  2. The plane hanger most contain a plane that is capable of autopilot and be equipped with missiles and/or machine guns.
  3. All automated things must be set to defended their base.

Mission:

  1. Make a Spaceplane equipped with weapons to attack this base on Eve!
  2. Go to the base and destroy the base on Eve.
  3. But make sure the enemy spaceplane survives and attacks you!
  4. Return home victories and land on the runway!

Scoring:

None if you succeed you win!

Leaderboard:

Coming after first entry!

Edited September 9, 2015 by ThaZeus
are we allowed to have other mods installed as well?
Yes but it depends what they are, so what are they?
